name: Politoed
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It gathers groups of others as their leader. Its cries make Poliwag obey.

poke_body.name: Enthusiasm
poke_body.effect: If you have Poliwag, Poliwhirl, and Poliwrath in play, each of these Pokémon’s attacks does 60 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Frog Hop
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.
